title: Love on a Shoestring
overview: In an era of rising prices, JIAN Keke has long understood the importance of saving money. Her life seemed to lack the option of love because dating was undeniably costly. That was until she encountered WANG Haikuò, whose spending was as extravagant as a flowing river. Elly, a gold-digging woman, swore to pursue Haikuò, but Keke believed he was kind. How could she allow him to be in deep water?
